item.title: INVACARE CORP 10-K
item.description: INVACARE CORP, which is in the Orthopedic, Prosthetic & Surgical Appliances & Supplies [3842] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 09, 2022 had 52763 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1233 instances company’s - 655 instances 2021 - 545 instances notes - 464 instances 2020 - 386 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
